name: Soccer Colosseum
description:
Imagination can take you anywhere, since a little boy in a normal town used a portal to transport himself to Ancient Rome. He finds himself in the ruins of a Roman Colosseum, where he's able to collect artifacts and play soccer. Maybe somehow by winning in a soccer game he's able to use one of the portals to transport him back to his hometown...

***

Credits:

Unity Asset Store - Colosseum, Ceasar head, soccer ball, vase, energy bar   

Battle Dragon - Axe, Brighter: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/battle-dragon-axe-...
